name: Soul Maze
description:
Soul Maze is a 1-2 Player Horror game. Use your flashlights to help guide your way through the mazes and collects parts of the souls to of the monsters in the mazes.

Features:
. Flashlight: This will be used to help you see in dark areas of the mazes
. Blue Flashlight: This will be used to stop the monsters for a short period of time
. 3 mazes: Three different mazes with a different monster in each maze
